channel.title: Comments on: The Final Whispers – Episode 140
channel.description: The Podcast of Technology Careers, Cultures, and Lives

item.title: By: The Day They Stopped Whispering – My Tribute to The Geek Whisperers – The NetworkNerd Blog
item.dc:creator: The Day They Stopped Whispering – My Tribute to The Geek Whisperers – The NetworkNerd Blog
item.description: […] 29, 2017 – I was there the day they stopped whispering.¬† It was the day episode 140 was recorded at a podcast booth on the VMworld show floor.¬† In my mind, this had all the makings […]

item.title: By: Andras
item.dc:creator: Andras
item.description: I just noticed in the iTunes feed, that it is your last episode :-( It was a great journey to listen to your podcast and I wish You all the best!
item.content:encoded: I just noticed in the iTunes feed, that it is your last episode üôÅ It was a great journey to listen to your podcast and I wish You all the best!

item.title: By: Howard Marks
item.dc:creator: Howard Marks
item.description: There's a sad sort of clanging from the clock in the hall And the bells in the steeple too And up in the nursery an absurd little bird Is popping out to say cuckoo (cuckoo, cuckoo) Regretfully they tell us, but firmly they compel us to say goodnight To you So long Farewell Auf wiedersehen Good night
item.content:encoded:
There’s a sad sort of clanging from the clock in the hall
And the bells in the steeple too
And up in the nursery an absurd little bird
Is popping out to say cuckoo (cuckoo, cuckoo)
Regretfully they tell us, but firmly they compel us to say goodnight
To you
So long
Farewell
Auf wiedersehen
Good night
